result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 1 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Introduction #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - [Discussion Post on Canvas](https://colostate.instructure.com/courses/193678/discussion_topics/1963784) - Readings for next class: - Hankin Chapter 2 - Gerber et al. 2012.pdf. ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Big Picture - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("sf","ggplot2", "spsurvey", "remotes")) # Github package install remotes::install_github("Pakillo/grateful") # OR, download the zip file here and manually install: # https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/grateful/index.html ``` ::: ##### **In Class Discussion Questions for Gerber et al. 2012** - #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Assigned Readings: - Betts et al. 2022 - Dumelle et al 2021. Only sections 1 to 1.1.2. - Williams and Brown 2019. Only sections 1 and 2. - Background Reading (not required): - Shmueli 2010. - Arif and MacNeil 2022.
